# 强化学习导论中文第二版

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/qianghua-xuexi-daolun-zhongwen-dier-ban
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/qianghua-xuexi-daolun-zhongwen-dier-ban
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install qianghua-xuexi-daolun-zhongwen-dier-ban
qianghua-xuexi-daolun-zhongwen-dier-ban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g qianghua-xuexi-daolun-zhongwen-dier-ban
qianghua-xuexi-daolun-zhongwen-dier-ban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
